[Hefty Hauler](/Feats.aspx?ID=790) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

---

You can carry more than your frame implies. Increase your maximum and encumbered Bulk limits by 2.
name: Hefty Hauler
